picture perfect as always but audio out of sync guys seriously!
anybody could tell me how to fix this? i try to use VLC to sync but audio wont come out.
use AC3 , IN SYSTEM , AUDIO VIDEO SYNC MOVE IT BY 18000. IT WILL BE OK

@wario_kong

For Vlc: In the small window (not full screen) at the bottom left, 3rd icon from the right click, it brings up adjustment and effects. Click on syncronization. + or - to adjust soundtrack sync.
